quotes.quote: Beware of suspicion for it is the most untruthful type of speech..
quotes.author: prophet muhammed

quotes.quote: The Prophet (ﷺ) would never find fault with food. If he desired it, he would eat. If he disliked it, he would leave it.
quotes.author: The Prophet (ﷺ)

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
